<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk update asset location"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/bulk/set-location"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Reassigns location for multiple assets in a single operation. Use this for mass transfers during school reorganizations, warehouse moves, or deployment rollouts.

**Prerequisites**
1. **AssetIds** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) to identify assets and extract `Items[].AssetId`.
2. **LocationId** - Use [GET /api/v2.0/locations/all/\{siteId\}](/docs/api/locations/get-all-site-locations-v-2) to get valid location UUIDs.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search for assets to move: [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) filtered by current location.
2. Get target location: [GET /api/v2.0/locations/all/\{siteId\}](/docs/api/locations/get-all-site-locations-v-2) and select the destination.
3. Submit [POST /api/v1.0/assets/bulk/set-location](/docs/api/assets/bulk-set-asset-location) with AssetIds and target LocationId.

**Minimal Required Fields**: AssetIds array, LocationId

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"AssetIds":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"Request":{"type":"object","properties":{"LocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"RoomId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true},"LocationDetails":{"type":"string","description":"Optional free-form description of the location"}},"required":["LocationId"]}},"required":["AssetIds","Request"],"title":"AssetBulkSetLocationRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Asset location updated"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
